verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_4: When the tombs are strewn around.
verse.verse_5: Each soul will know what it has advanced, and what it has deferred.
verse.verse_6: O man! What deluded you concerning your Lord, the Most Generous?
verse.verse_7: He Who created you, and formed you, and proportioned you?
verse.verse_8: In whatever shape He willed, He assembled you.
verse.verse_13: The virtuous will be in bliss.
verse.verse_14: While the wicked will be in Hell.
verse.verse_15: They will enter it on the Day of Justice.
verse.verse_16: And they will not be absent from it.
verse.verse_17: But what will convey to you what the Day of Justice is?
verse.verse_18: Then again, what will convey to you what the Day of Justice is?
verse.verse_19: The Day when no soul will avail another soul anything; and the decision on that Day is God's.
